column1: [Jones] The Utah Jazz are not expected to extend a qualifying offer to Juwan Morgan, making him an unrestricted free agent, league sources tell The Athletic. The two sides have not closed the door on an eventual return. Morgan is expected to have interest on the market
[Scotto] The Boston Celtics have agreed to a deal with Juwan Morgan, his agency Edge Sports told HoopsHype.

[Weiss] The Boston Celtics are waiving Theo Pinson, Chris Clemons, & Garrison Matthews, per source. Pinson & Clemons, along with Luke Kornet, Ryan Arcidiacono, & Juwan Morgan will go to Maine, while Matthews becomes a free agent. Jabari Parker & Bruno Fernando will remain with the team.
